org.aion.api

Interface IChain


  • public interface IChain
    This interface provides methods for fetching blockchain specific details such as blocks and transactions.
    Author:
    Jay Tseng

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ApiMsg blockNumber()
      Returns the current block number of the Aion Kernel connected.
      ApiMsg getBalance(org.aion.base.type.Address address)
      GetBalance returns a BigInteger representing the balance of the account address at latest block number.
      ApiMsg getBalance(org.aion.base.type.Address address, long blockNumber)
      GetBalance returns a Long value representing the balance of the account address at a certain block number.
      ApiMsg getBlockByHash(org.aion.base.type.Hash256 blockHash)
      Retrieves a block given the block hash.
      ApiMsg getBlockByNumber(long blockNumber)
      Gets the block corresponding to the block number.
      ApiMsg getBlockTransactionCountByHash(org.aion.base.type.Hash256 blockHash)
      Retrieves the total transactions within a block at a given block hash.
      ApiMsg getBlockTransactionCountByNumber(long blockNumber)
      Retrieves the total transactions within a block at a given block number.
      ApiMsg getTransactionByBlockHashAndIndex(org.aion.base.type.Hash256 blockHash, int index)
      Gets a transaction given a block hash and transaction index.
      ApiMsg getTransactionByBlockNumberAndIndex(long blockNumber, int index)
      Gets a transaction based on the block number and transaction index.
      ApiMsg getTransactionByHash(org.aion.base.type.Hash256 transactionHash)
      Retrieves the transaction given the transaction hash.
      ApiMsg getTransactionCount(org.aion.base.type.Address address, long blockNumber)
      Retrieves the total transactions committed by a certain account address at a given block number.

    • Method Detail

      • blockNumber

        ApiMsg blockNumber()
        Returns the current block number of the Aion Kernel connected.
        Returns:
        The current block number by long value wrapped into ApiMsg. You can retrieve through the method getObject.

      • getBalance

        ApiMsg getBalance(org.aion.base.type.Address address)
        GetBalance returns a BigInteger representing the balance of the account address at latest block number.
        Parameters:
        address - the class Address of the desired account to get the balance of.
        Returns:
        balance of the desired account by the class BigInteger wrapped into ApiMsg. You can retrieve through the method getObject.

      • getBalance

        ApiMsg getBalance(org.aion.base.type.Address address,
                  long blockNumber)
        GetBalance returns a Long value representing the balance of the account address at a certain block number.
        Parameters:
        address - the class Address of the desired account.
        blockNumber - the block number by long value at which the balance of the address should be retrieved from.
        Returns:
        balance of the desired account by the class BigInteger wrapped into ApiMsg. You can retrieve through the method getObject.

      • getBlockByNumber

        ApiMsg getBlockByNumber(long blockNumber)
        Gets the block corresponding to the block number.
        Parameters:
        blockNumber - the block number by long value of the desired block.
        Returns:
        the class block format wrapped into ApiMsg. You can retrieve through the method getObject.

      • getTransactionByBlockHashAndIndex

        ApiMsg getTransactionByBlockHashAndIndex(org.aion.base.type.Hash256 blockHash,
                                         int index)
        Gets a transaction given a block hash and transaction index.
        Parameters:
        blockHash - 32 bytes hash of the desired block wrapped into the class Hash256.
        index - the transaction position by int value of the transaction been stored into the desired block.
        Returns:
        the class transaction information wrapped into ApiMsg. You can retrieve through the method getObject.

      • getTransactionByBlockNumberAndIndex

        ApiMsg getTransactionByBlockNumberAndIndex(long blockNumber,
                                           int index)
        Gets a transaction based on the block number and transaction index.
        Parameters:
        blockNumber - the block number by long value of the desired block.
        index - the transaction position by int value of the transaction been stored into the desired block.
        Returns:
        the class transaction wrapped into ApiMsg. You can retrieve through the method getObject.

      • getBlockByHash

        ApiMsg getBlockByHash(org.aion.base.type.Hash256 blockHash)
        Retrieves a block given the block hash.
        Parameters:
        blockHash - 32 bytes hash of the desired block wrapped into the class Hash256.
        Returns:
        the class block format wrapped into ApiMsg. You can retrieve through the method getObject.

      • getBlockTransactionCountByHash

        ApiMsg getBlockTransactionCountByHash(org.aion.base.type.Hash256 blockHash)
        Retrieves the total transactions within a block at a given block hash.
        Parameters:
        blockHash - 32 bytes hash of the desired block wrapped into the class Hash256.
        Returns:
        the transaction number of the block by int value wrapped into ApiMsg. You can retrieve through the method getObject.

      • getBlockTransactionCountByNumber

        ApiMsg getBlockTransactionCountByNumber(long blockNumber)
        Retrieves the total transactions within a block at a given block number.
        Parameters:
        blockNumber - the block number by long value of the desired block.
        Returns:
        the transaction number of the block by int value wrapped into ApiMsg. You can retrieve through the method getObject.

      • getTransactionCount

        ApiMsg getTransactionCount(org.aion.base.type.Address address,
                           long blockNumber)
        Retrieves the total transactions committed by a certain account address at a given block number.
        Parameters:
        address - the class Address of the desired account.
        blockNumber - the block number by long value of the desired block.
        Returns:
        the transaction number of the block by long value wrapped into ApiMsg. You can retrieve through the method getObject.

      • getTransactionByHash

        ApiMsg getTransactionByHash(org.aion.base.type.Hash256 transactionHash)
        Retrieves the transaction given the transaction hash. Function will throw if transaction is not found, or the transaction hash is improperly formatted.
        Parameters:
        transactionHash - 32 bytes hash of the desired transaction wrapped into the class Hash256.
        Returns:
        the class Transaction containing all relevant information related to the transaction wrapped into ApiMsg. You can retrieve through the method getObject.
